name: Thai Black Pepper Beef Stir-Fry Recipe
description: This stir-fry combines juicy beef with healthy vegetables and Asian flavors.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine egg white, cornstarch, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Use a glove to knead it by hand. Add beef and coat. Let the marinade sit for at least an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, combine egg white, cornstarch, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Use a glove to knead it by hand. Add beef and coat. Let the marinade sit for at least an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a wok or skillet over medium heat, then add oil. When hot, fry garlic until fragrant and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a wok or skillet over medium heat, then add oil. When hot, fry garlic until fragrant and golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the marinated beef and cook until done, but don’t overcook.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the marinated beef and cook until done, but don’t overcook.

recipeInstructions.text: Add golden mountain sauce, oyster sauce, black pepper, and water. Stir well to combine and coat the beef.
recipeInstructions.name: Add golden mountain sauce, oyster sauce, black pepper, and water. Stir well to combine and coat the beef.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions, green onions, and bell peppers. Cook until they’re as soft as you like. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions, green onions, and bell peppers. Cook until they’re as soft as you like. Serve immediately.

review.reviewBody:
Perfect description and recipe! Delicious dish…

Many thanks.

keywords: black pepper beef stir-fry, pepper beef, thai black pepper beef
